list_definition.definition: to make (a hole) with a drill

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He drilled holes in the wood
The company plans to drill for oil.

list_definition.definition: (of soldiers etc) to exercise or be exercised
exercise or practice, especially of soldiers

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We do half an hour of drill every morning.
